en.name: Hunter’s Path
en.passiveName: At the End of the Beast-Paths
en.passiveDescription: Gain {{12%//15%//18%//21%//24%}} All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain the Tireless Hunt effect after hitting an opponent with a Charged Attack. This effect increases Charged Attack DMG by {{160%//200%//240%//280%//320%}} of Elemental Mastery. This effect will be removed after 12 Charged Attacks or 10s. Only 1 instance of Tireless Hunt can be gained every 12s.

zh.name: 猎人之径
zh.passiveDescription: 获得{{12%//15%//18%//21%//24%}}所有元素伤害加成。重击命中敌人后，将获得「无休止的狩猎」：重击造成的伤害值提高，提高值相当于元素精通数值的{{160%//200%//240%//280%//320%}}。该效果将在生效12次或10秒后消失，每12秒至多获得一次无休止的狩猎。
